plot: Tsubasa continues her job at the A&R department of the major recording company Gandala Music. The idol group "B-PROJECT" that she has been in charge of, now made up of four idol units instead of three: Kitakore, Thrive, MooNs, and KiLLER KiNG. Tsubasa must deals with not only the various challenges of her job but also a group of young men with different personalities.
ending_theme: "Hikari to Kage no Toki Musubu" (Linking the Time of Light and Shadow) by B-PROJECT
